PostgreSQL research

rhel5.5_x64 install-template for database cluster

2010-08-03 11:19:29   查看原文>>

近日有大批量的数据库服务器上线，安装系统的任务交给网络TEAM的同事完成，下面是一份安装模板。

数据库服务器OS安装模板:
OS版本
(64位 RHEL5.5)

RAID:
前面两块盘做RAID1作为系统盘,其余的盘两两RAID1不需要分配.

文件系统配置:
/ 32G
/opt 所有剩余空间
swap 2*MEM_SIZE 且 <=16GB

RHEL5.5_x64 Kickstart文件:
# Kickstart file automatically generated by anaconda.

install
nfs --server=192.168.23.10 --dir=/mnt
key a6b403f5a51ffa03
lang en_US.UTF-8
keyboard us
xconfig --startxonboot
network --device eth0 --bootproto static --ip 192.168.29.33 --netmask 255.255.255.0 --gateway 192.168.29.1 --nameserver 202.101.172.35 --hostname skycac-db-192168029033.sky-mobi.com
network --device eth1 --onboot no --bootproto static --hostname skycac-db-192168029033.sky-mobi.com
rootpw --iscrypted $1$2rrgFboW$7rLv5ODlS0n72wlZFeoNz/
firewall --enabled --port=22:tcp
authconfig --enableshadow --enablemd5
selinux --disabled
timezone Asia/Shanghai
bootloader --location=mbr --driveorder=cciss/c0d0 --append="rhgb quiet"
# The following is the partition information you requested
# Note that any partitions you deleted are not expressed
# here so unless you clear all partitions first, this is
# not guaranteed to work
#clearpart --linux
#part / --fstype ext3 --onpart cciss/c0d0p1
#part swap --onpart cciss/c0d0p2
#part /opt --fstype ext3 --onpart cciss/c0d0p3

%packages
@admin-tools
@base
@chinese-support
@cluster-storage
@clustering
@core
@development-libs
@development-tools
@dialup
@editors
@gnome-desktop
@graphical-internet
@legacy-software-development
@legacy-software-support
@system-tools
@text-internet
@base-x
kexec-tools
fipscheck
device-mapper-multipath
sgpio
perl-XML-SAX
libstdc++44-devel
perl-XML-NamespaceSupport
perl-Crypt-SSLeay
python-imaging
python-dmidecode
gcc44-c++
pexpect
imake
gcc44
emacs
gtk+
compat-db
openssl097a
compat-readline43
compat-openldap
compat-slang
openmotif22
tog-pegasus
audit
sysstat
xorg-x11-utils
xorg-x11-server-Xnest
xorg-x11-server-Xvfb
-yum-updatesd
-bluez-utils
-wvdial
-minicom
-isdn4k-utils
-bluez-hcidump
-bluez-gnome

Flag Counter
